sentence.Network_en: Adam raised the issue of multimedia applications and much useful discussion ensued.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当提出了多媒体应用的问题,从而引发了许多有益的讨论.

sentence.Network_en: As part of the celebrations they staged a big, open - air multimedia event, with music, videos, poetry readings, dance and improvisations.
sentence.Network_cn: 在庆典中,他们举行了大型的露天多媒体活动, 其中有音乐 、 录像 、 诗朗诵 、 舞蹈和即兴表演.

sentence.Network_en: Now that you're writing a book, you need a fast, high - capacity display , with multimedia system.
sentence.Network_cn: 既然你要写书的话, 你需要一台运转快, 容量大的机子.要有多媒体功能的.

encyclopedia.content: 多媒体（duō méi tǐ） 的英文单词是Multimedia，它由media和multi两部分组成。一般理解为多种媒体的综合。多媒体是计算机和视频技术的结合，实际上它是两个媒体；声音和图像，或者用现在的术语：音响和电视。

entry.def: You use multimedia to refer to computer programs and products which involve sound, pictures, and film, as well as text.

example.ex: ...the case of an insurance company using multimedia to improve customer service in its branches.
example.tran: 保险公司使用多媒体改进其分支机构的客户服务的例子

example.ex: ...the next generation of computers, which will be 'multimedia machines' that allow users to control and manipulate sound, video, text and graphics.
example.tran: 将来的新一代电脑，即允许用户操控声音、录像、文本和制图的“多媒体机”

entry.def: In education, multimedia is the use of television and other different media in a lesson, as well as books.
In art, multimedia is the use of different kinds of material in a painting, sculpture or performance.

means.word_mean: 1. transmission that combine media of communication (text and graphics and sound etc.)

Sentence.sentence: He calls Inkling a platform for publishers to build rich multimedia content from the ground up, with a heavy emphasis on real-world functionality.
Matt Maclnnis describes the updated version of Inkling asa platform for building multimedia content.
a platform for building multimedia content.
